name: tablelink-monorepo
description: TableLink 모노레포 - 프론트엔드 및 백엔드 통합 관리

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev" "npm run dev:tlm" "npm run dev:kds" "npm run dev:pos"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:tlm && npm run build:kds && npm run build:pos
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix TableLink/TLG && npm install --prefix TableLink/TLM && npm install --prefix TableLink/KDS && npm install --prefix TableLink/POS && npm install --prefix server
